name: Mine Sweeper HD
description:
The classical Windows Mine Sweeper has an HD version.

Features:

  • Play through three difficulty levels or create your own.
  • Beautiful 3d environment and sounds, creating a relaxing atmosphere.
  • Customizable flag image, upload your own.
  • Dashboard with the fastest times and higher difficulty proportions.
  • Night or day mode.
  • Explosion mode (you won't be able to see the final layout with this enabled).

Mouse Controls:

  • Right-click to reveal the crate.
  • Left-click to place or unplace flag.
  • Mouse wheel to zoom in/out.
  • Move the mouse to the edges to move the camera.

(You can only play the easy mode in the demo version)

(Mac builds were not tested by the dev itself, please play the demo before any purchase)
